titles.title: VA CBA Act of 2025
VA CBA Act of 2025
Veterans Affairs Care and Benefits Accountability Act of 2025

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to affirm a collective bargaining agreement, and to nullify certain Executive orders that relate to, collective bargaining by employees of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
